0.1.1.name: wordpress/g3client
0.1.1.description:
G3Client embedds Gallery3 resources (albums, photos) into a Wordpress posting or page. It requires the following software available on the server:

  • PHP 5 (tested with 5.3, recommended)
  • Wordpress 3 (tested with 3.0.5)
  • Gallery3 with REST API (tested with Gallery3 3.0.1)
  • PHP CURL Extension or HTTP_Request2 (http://pear.php.net/package/HTTP_Request2/)
